scenario_text.value:
Well, you two sure took your time. I thought
you were goners for sure.

Sorry, we got caught up in helping out with
the repairs after our last fight.

What?! That’s the kinda thing you can do any
time! It’s hardly life or death, now is it?

Hey, don’t just clam up on me. Answer the
question!

(After we leave here, there’s no guarantee
we’ll ever come back.)

(Aoi and Ryo both know that, and it’s
painfully clear what they’re both thinking.)

Incidentally, have you all considered where
you’ll be going next?

We talked things over with the Professor, and
decided our best bet is to head north.

From what we’ve been able to determine,
that’s where the fog is at its thickest.

We’re not sure how it will affect the Four
Sovereign Monsters, but we can’t lose contact.

So you will cross the sea. Make sure you
exercise all due caution!

Yet I’m confident you will succeed in gaining
the aid of the Four Sovereign Monsters.
I certainly hope so.

Come, come, do not fear. I’m sure you’ll all
be fine.

True, I may only have an intuition, but I’ve
found my instincts to generally be correct.

Yeah! We’ll make sure you’re right about
this, at least.
(What do I say to Jijimon?)
We’ll save the world!
We’ll rescue Miyuki!
We’ll stop the Master!
We’ll save the world!
We’ll get Miyuki back from the Master!
We’ll stop the Master!

(Such positive words came naturally. I wonder
if that’s because of what Jijimon said...)

You’re right, Takuma. There’s no point in us
losing heart now.

That’s the spirit. Let’s focus on getting
this done.

I trust your instincts, Jijimon. Now, we’d
better get going.
Thank you for all your help. So long!
Let’s go, everyone!
(We’re all heading north at last.)
Farewell!

(Jijimon and the others stay to see us off
until we’re out of sight.)

(At this point, I appreciate how much that
shows they care. It’s proof we share a bond.)

*sniff* Man, why’d they have to go and do
something to make me cry?
Ryo, you’re crying?

Of course I’m crying! Think about how much
they did for us!
And now this... It’s just too much.

(None of us really wanted to be on an
adventure like this...)
(...but I think we’ve all grown as a result.)

(Ryo would never have acknowledged his
feelings before. And it’s not just him.)

(I’ve grown too. I feel like we all have.
Maybe that’s what Jijimon saw in us.)

(Maybe that’s why he said what he did. The
way we are now, things really could be okay.)
